Parent Advisory Committee
School of Commerce, Finance and Accountancy, CHRIST (Deemed to be University), Delhi NCR Campus has constituted a Parent Advisory Committee(PAC). The committee consists of parent members who are associated with Industry, Academia, Government Bodies or are self-employed.
The First meeting of the PAC was held on 15 th December 2023. The meeting was presided by Dr.Fr. Jossy George, Campus Dean and Director. The meeting invoked meaningful discussion wherein parents conveyed their viewpoints and perceptions which were aptly taken and addressed.
